Flow.description: When KYC status change send email and if necessary create case against it.

value.stringValue:
IF( AND((NOT((ISBLANK([Account].IEC__c)))), ([Account].IEC__c == [Account].IEC_Manual_Input__c) ,
( OR( ( ISPICKVAL( [Account].KYC_Status__c , 'API Verified') ), ( ISPICKVAL( [Account].KYC_Status__c , 'Manually Verified') ))), ( [Account].Is_Billing_Address_Present__c ),
( [Account].Billing_Address__c <> null ), ( [Account].Is_Finance_Contact_Present__c ), ( [Account].Primary_Address__c <> null )
) ,true,false)

formulas.name: formula_34_myRule_33_A1_5265841383
formulas.expression:
IF( AND((NOT((ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.IEC__c})))), ({!myVariable_current.IEC__c} == {!myVariable_current.IEC_Manual_Input__c}) ,
( OR( ( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.KYC_Status__c} , 'API Verified') ), ( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.KYC_Status__c} , 'Manually Verified') ))), ( {!myVariable_current.Is_Billing_Address_Present__c} ),
( {!myVariable_current.Billing_Address__c} <> null ), ( {!myVariable_current.Is_Finance_Contact_Present__c} ), ( {!myVariable_current.Primary_Address__c} <> null )
) ,true,false)

formulas.name: formula_35_myRule_33_A1_5216449363

value.stringValue:
IF( AND((NOT((ISBLANK([Account].IEC__c)))), (NOT( ISBLANK([Account].Name_As_Per_PAN_Manual_Input__c) )), ([Account].IEC__c == [Account].IEC_Manual_Input__c) ,
( OR( ( ISPICKVAL( [Account].KYC_Status__c , 'API Verified') ), ( ISPICKVAL( [Account].KYC_Status__c , 'Manually Verified') )) ),
( [Account].Billing_Address__c <> null ), ( [Account].Is_Finance_Contact_Present__c ), ( [Account].Primary_Address__c <> null )
) ,true,false)

formulas.name: formula_36_myRule_33_A1_6776138584
formulas.expression:
IF( AND((NOT((ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.IEC__c})))), (NOT( ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Name_As_Per_PAN_Manual_Input__c}) )), ({!myVariable_current.IEC__c} == {!myVariable_current.IEC_Manual_Input__c}) ,
( OR( ( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.KYC_Status__c} , 'API Verified') ), ( ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.KYC_Status__c} , 'Manually Verified') )) ),
( {!myVariable_current.Billing_Address__c} <> null ), ( {!myVariable_current.Is_Finance_Contact_Present__c} ), ( {!myVariable_current.Primary_Address__c} <> null )
) ,true,false)

value.stringValue: ISNEW() && If( ([Account].RecordType.Name == 'Quick Billing') || ([Account].RecordType.Name == 'Quick Shipping') , TRUE, FALSE)

formulas.name: formula_myRule_38
formulas.expression: ISNEW() && If( ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} == 'Quick Billing') || ({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} == 'Quick Shipping') , TRUE, FALSE)

value.stringValue: AND( ISNEW() , OR( (([Account].RecordType.Name) = "Billing"), (([Account].RecordType.Name) = "Quick Billing")) , ISPICKVAL([Account].BVC_Legal_Entity__c, 'B.V.C. Logistics Private Limited' ),ISBLANK([Account].Parentid),[Account].Legacy_Record__c = false )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_42
formulas.expression: AND( ISNEW() , OR( (({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name}) = "Billing"), (({!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name}) = "Quick Billing")) , ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BVC_Legal_Entity__c}, 'B.V.C. Logistics Private Limited' ),ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.ParentId}),{!myVariable_current.Legacy_Record__c} = false )
